property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put up to 2 of your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of those shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ While you have another fire creature in the battle zone, this creature has "speed attacker". ■ While you have another nature creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. {MANA ARMS} 3: When you put this creature, if you have 3 or more light cards in your mana zone, you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 4 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
